resources.string: "ERR: The codes you were try to add is damaged."
"MatataCode is currently connecting to a device. Click 'OK' to disconnect and quit."
"Save Error: Storage is full. You can save 255 code phases at most."
"Link to a MatataBot/Matatalab Controller before you run the code."
"Your MatataBot(or Matalab) is ready for DFU process."
"Your Matatalab Controller is ready for DFU process. Press its Power button once to make it scannable. "

"The bot named 'MatataBot' or 'Matalab' means it is working. Click 'Ready' to make it ready for DFU upgrade, which will change the name to 'mdfubot' or 'MataDfu'. You need to search again after you finish this step to find 'mdfubot' or 'MataDfu'."

"The controller named 'MatataCon' means it is working. Click 'Ready' to make it ready for DFU upgrade, which will change the name to 'mdfucon'. You need to press the Controller's power button and search again after you finish this step to find 'mdfucon'."

"Click 'Start' to perform DFU for Tower. 'mdfutow'/‘MataDfu’ will get back to working mode after 3 mins if the DFU does not perform. If it becomes working mode, use the Windows Application we supplied to make it ready for DFU process again."
"Click 'Start' to perform DFU for bot. 'mdfubot' and 'MataDfu' will turn off and back to working mode after 3 mins if the DFU does not perform. If it turns off, just turn it on and search again."
"Click 'Start' to perform DFU for controller. 'mdfucon' will sleep after 3 mins if the DFU does not perform. If it falls to sleep, just press its power button, and try again."
"If the device's signal is not good, it may cause the DFU process to fail. Put your devices closer. [Device name:"

"'MataDfu' may stands for a MatataTower or a MatataBot. Please choose the right device type for DFU process.





"
"Le matatacon n’est pas en mode capteur, veuillez changer de mode et réessayer."
"La version du micrologiciel ne correspond pas à la version prise en charge par l’extension. Veuillez mettre à niveau le micrologiciel."
"Veuillez mettre à niveau le MatataBot connecté à ce MatataCon."
